content: --दग्ध {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} burnt on the funeral pile; अग्निदग्धाश्च ये जीवा येऽप्यदग्धाः कुले मम <ls>Vāyu.</ls> {2} burnt with fire. {3} burnt at once without having fire put into the mouth, because destitute of issue (?); (<ab>pl.</ab>) a class of Manes or Pitṛs who, when alive, kept up the household flame and presented oblations to fire.
